title.description: Used as the book title and as the basis for the output filename.

creator.description: The name of the author. Embedded into output meta-data and used for by-lines.

filters.description: Names of filters to be applied to each chapter sequentially, or a set of named filter name arrays.

filename.description: Specifies the base name for emitted output files. Omits extension, since that is appended by each output plugin (see below) as appropriate.

output.description: Used to specify one or more integrations filters that build output files based on the filtered chapter contents.

byline.description: If specified, this will add an author byline to this chapter. This can be used to support collected content by various authors with full per-chapter attribution.

title.description: The chapter title. Used to generate headings and when building TOCs.

src.description: The source location of the material for the given chapter. This can be any value appropriate to the chosen input filter.

contents.description: Each element of the array is an object describing a chapter.
